sentence.idiomatic: There are so many websites, looking around though I still think that ours is the best.
I've looked this clothing over up and down and I think it isn't anything special. Why is it so expensive?
You have to concentrate in class. Don't be looking around.
This book is really good. It's worth reading.
That person is not honest. He's not worthy of your love.
Do you think spending 20,000 RMB on a brand name purse is worth it?
Our teacher has an especially gentlemanly way about him.
I've heard that Englishmen are all very gentlemanly. They always give women preferential treatment.
He is not a gentleman at all. He speaks very impolitely.
When buying a car, I give first priority to safety.
Nowadays everyone is equal. Who can justify giving preferential treatment to rich people?
Sort out these documents and give priority to dealing with those that are urgent.
I really don't get why you like watching romantic films so much.
I understand less and less what my children are thinking.
Now it's trendy to dress in unisex clothing. Sometimes I can't figure out if a person is male or female.
This movie is really dull--it is totally unoriginal.
Lately I feel that work is more and more boring.
Don't you feel bored playing games every day?
Is London fun?
It's so great! It's both ancient and modern. It's the best city I've ever been to.
I think it's just average. Wherever you look everything is more or less the same.

word.literal: to be unable to see all

sentence.idiomatic: No way. Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, the Thames River... plus there are lots of museums. There's no way to see it all. I have to go back again.
Those are all nice places.
Ah, they're just places, not as good as I had imagined. Plus the admission tickets are really expensive. We spent a few thousand on tickets alone.
That much!
But it's really worth it.
Are the men very gentlemanly there?
Yes, they all let ladies go first, not like my husband.

word.literal: to not be able to understand

sentence.idiomatic: I really can't get why you like London so much. The weather is terrible. And the food is awful.
What did you eat?
Fish and chips.
Totally disgusting.
Traveling with you is so boring.

word.literal: to be unable to see everything
